title: Banana and dulce de leche cupcakes
ingredients: ['460g mashed bananas', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '300g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch of salt', '170g butter, softened', '240g caster sugar', '3 large eggs, beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '350ml buttermilk', 'Dulce de leche', '125g dulce de leche (or confiture de lait)', '100ml single cream']
